alert.note: Alert for George; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 4:15AM CST until November 30 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... George County in southeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 500 AM CST. * At 415 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Lucedale to 17 miles south of McLain to 18 miles east of Perkinston to 6 miles east of McHenry, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lucedale, Chunchula, McHenry, Gulfcrest, Semmes, Tanner Williams, Movico and Wilmer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
